title: ORNOT Micro Musette
content:
Calling Josh Weinberg. We’ve got another musette for your collection! ORNOT just announced the all-new Micro Musette ($38)…

The Micro Musette is an extremely packable version of the classic cycling accessory. Whether you’re carrying a spare set of clothes, sandwiches for all your friends, or extra shoes, it’s designed to accommodate everything within reason.

Crafted in California from recycled lightweight ripstop, this packable musette merges ORNOT’s love for post-ride snacks with our commitment to doing things differently. The integrated stash pocket is created from voids in our Micro Climate Jacket pattern (aka waste fabric they don’t want to throw away). They added a snap-secured flap to keep things safe and a pleated base to expand enough for that one thing you almost forgot.

Specs:

  • Made using deadstock Polartec NeoShell®
  • Fits 6 bahn mi sandwiches
  • Secure lid with double snaps
  • Box stitch reinforced strap
  • Reflective detail
  • 13″ x 15″
  • Cut and sewn in California.

See more at ORNOT.

The post ORNOT Micro Musette appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
